metadata.title: Web Development & AI Automation | Flamingo Devs
metadata.description: Professional web development, Shopify online stores, and AI automation solutions. WordPress, Next.js, and e-commerce specialist. Certified Shopify Partner. Worldwide consulting services.
metadata.keywords: web development, online store, Shopify, automation, artificial intelligence, WordPress, Next.js, e-commerce, freelance developer, AI consulting

hero.headline: AI Consulting & Web Development That Scales Your Business
hero.subheadline: Purpose-built solutions combining artificial intelligence with modern web technologies. From e-commerce to custom platforms, I deliver results.

about.title: About Me
about.name: Christian Rios
about.bio: I combine AI expertise with full-stack development to create solutions that truly impact businesses. With experience across WordPress, Shopify, Next.js, and more, I bring a unique perspective that bridges cutting-edge AI with practical web development.
about.bio2: My approach is purpose-built: understanding your goals first, then crafting the right technology stack to achieve them. Whether you need an AI-powered automation, a high-converting e-commerce store, or a custom web application, I deliver quality craft with fast execution.
